name: BasketballSchedule
0:
”Alexa open n. b. a. schedule”
”Alexa ask n. b. a. schedule when is the next game for the nuggets”
”Is there a game on October 18th”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: n. b. a. schedule
des:
This skill searches the Full pro basketball regular season schedule. Users can search by date, team name + date and next home or road game for a team.
Please ask the skill phrases similar to the following:
Are there any games tomorrow
Is there a game on October 10th
Is there a game on the November 21,2017
Is there a game today
Are there any games on December 22
What are the games for January 11
What is the next home game for the Lakers
When is the next road game for the New York Knicks
Are the Mavs playing on February 12th
When are the Heat playing next
When is the next game for the Bulls
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
